name: Al-Fatiha
translation: In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

name: Al-Baqara
translation: This is the Book about which there is no doubt.

name: Al-Imran
translation: Allah! There is no deity except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence.

name: An-Nisa
translation: O mankind, fear your Lord, who created you from one soul.

name: Al-Ma'idah
translation: O you who have believed, fulfill all contracts.

name: Al-An'am
translation: All praise is due to Allah, who created the heavens and the earth.

name: Al-A'raf
translation: This is a Book sent down to you - so let there not be in your breast distress.

name: anfal
translation: This is a Book sent down to you - so let there not be in your breast distress.

name: urdu_point
translation: This is a Book sent down to you - so let there not be in your breast distress.
